PersonalStatement.text: Adam Weiss, born on 1983-11-13, is a Male based in Port Patricia, Burkina Faso. He is Single and holds Chilean nationality. Currently working at Ware-Parker.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at Blevins Ltd from 2013 to 2020.
Senior Financial Analyst at Ware-Parker, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from Universidad del Bío-Bío
Master's in Engineering from Universidad de Concepción
